title: Sci Tech & Regulation
description: Examines historical, legal, economic, and political rationales for regulation.  Survey of administrative law and processes, risk analysis/management, expertise and public, and current topical issues.  Credit not allowed for both PUBP 6440 and PUBP 4440.
